verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

צַ֞ו <S%H6680><s%> Command אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you בָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> unto them When ye come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> (this [is] the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> that תִּפֹּ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> that shall fall לָכֶם֙ בְּֽנַחֲלָ֔ה <S%H5159><s%> unto you for an inheritance אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [even] the land כְּנַ֖עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan לִגְבֻלֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H1367><s%> with the coasts

וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> shall extend לָכֶ֧ם פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> quarter נֶ֛גֶב <S%H5045><s%> Then your south מִמִּדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> shall be from the wilderness צִ֖ן <S%H6790><s%> of Zin עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> along יְדֵ֣י <S%H3027><s%> along by the coast אֱד֑וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> shall extend לָכֶם֙ גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> border נֶ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> and your south מִקְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> shall be the outmost coast יָם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea הַמֶּ֖לַח <S%H4417><s%> of the salt קֵֽדְמָה׃ <S%H6924><s%> eastward

וְנָסַ֣ב <S%H5437><s%> shall turn לָכֶם֩ הַגְּב֨וּל <S%H1366><s%> And your border מִנֶּ֜גֶב <S%H5045><s%> from the south לְמַעֲלֵ֤ה עַקְרַבִּים֙ <S%H4610><s%> of Akrabbim וְעָ֣בַר <S%H5674><s%> and pass on צִ֔נָה <S%H6790><s%> to Zin [וְהָיָה כ] (וְהָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become ק) תּֽוֹצְאֹתָ֔יו <S%H8444><s%> and the going forth מִנֶּ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> thereof shall be from the south לְקָדֵ֣שׁ בַּרְנֵ֑עַ <S%H6947><s%> to Kadeshbarnea וְיָצָ֥א <S%H3318><s%> and shall go on חֲצַר־ אַדָּ֖ר <S%H2692><s%> to Hazaraddar וְעָבַ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> and pass on עַצְמֹֽנָה׃ <S%H6111><s%> to Azmon

וְנָסַ֧ב <S%H5437><s%> shall fetch a compass הַגְּב֛וּל <S%H1366><s%> And the border מֵעַצְמ֖וֹן <S%H6111><s%> from Azmon נַ֣חְלָה <S%H5158><s%> unto the river מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become תוֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <S%H8444><s%> and the goings out הַיָּֽמָּה׃ <S%H3220><s%> of it shall be at the sea

וּגְב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> border יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> And [as for] the western וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> shall have לָכֶ֛ם הַיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ye shall even have the great וּגְב֑וּל <S%H1366><s%> for a border זֶֽה־ <S%H2088><s%> this יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> shall have לָכֶ֖ם גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> border יָֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> this shall be your west

וְזֶֽה־ <S%H2088><s%> and this יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֖ם גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> border צָפ֑וֹן <S%H6828><s%> And this shall be your north מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> sea הַגָּדֹ֔ל <S%H1419><s%> from the great תְּתָא֥וּ <S%H8376><s%> ye shall point out לָכֶ֖ם הֹ֥ר <S%H2023><s%> Hor הָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> for you mount

מֵהֹ֣ר <S%H2023><s%> Hor הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> From mount תְּתָא֖וּ <S%H8376><s%> ye shall point out לְבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> [your border] unto the entrance חֲמָ֑ת <S%H2574><s%> of Hamath וְהָי֛וּ <S%H1961><s%> become תּוֹצְאֹ֥ת <S%H8444><s%> and the goings forth הַגְּבֻ֖ל <S%H1366><s%> of the border צְדָֽדָה׃ <S%H6657><s%> shall be to Zedad

וְיָצָ֤א <S%H3318><s%> shall go on הַגְּבֻל֙ <S%H1366><s%> And the border זִפְרֹ֔נָה <S%H2202><s%> to Ziphron וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become תוֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <S%H8444><s%> and the goings out חֲצַ֣ר עֵינָ֑ן <S%H2704><s%> of it shall be at Hazarenan זֶֽה־ <S%H2088><s%> This יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֖ם גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> border צָפֽוֹן׃ <S%H6828><s%> this shall be your north

וְהִתְאַוִּיתֶ֥ם <S%H184><s%> And ye shall point out לָכֶ֖ם לִגְב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> border קֵ֑דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> your east מֵחֲצַ֥ר עֵינָ֖ן <S%H2704><s%> from Hazarenan שְׁפָֽמָה׃ <S%H8221><s%> to Shepham

וְיָרַ֨ד <S%H3381><s%> shall go down הַגְּבֻ֧ל <S%H1366><s%> And the coast מִשְּׁפָ֛ם <S%H8221><s%> from Shepham הָרִבְלָ֖ה <S%H7247><s%> to Riblah מִקֶּ֣דֶם <S%H6924><s%> on the east side לָעָ֑יִן <S%H5871><s%> of Ain וְיָרַ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> shall descend הַגְּב֔וּל <S%H1366><s%> and the border וּמָחָ֛ה <S%H4229><s%> and shall reach עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto כֶּ֥תֶף <S%H3802><s%> unto the side יָם־ <S%H3220><s%> of the sea כִּנֶּ֖רֶת <S%H3672><s%> of Chinnereth קֵֽדְמָה׃ <S%H6924><s%> eastward

וְיָרַ֤ד <S%H3381><s%> shall go down הַגְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> And the border הַיַּרְדֵּ֔נָה <S%H3383><s%> to Jordan וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become תוֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <S%H8444><s%> and the goings out יָ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הַמֶּ֑לַח <S%H4417><s%> of it shall be at the salt זֹאת֩ <S%H2063><s%> likewise תִּהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֥ם הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> this shall be your land לִגְבֻלֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H1367><s%> with the coasts סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> thereof round about

וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> commanded מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> This [is] the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּתְנַחֲל֤וּ <S%H5157><s%> which ye shall inherit אֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> בְּגוֹרָ֔ל <S%H1486><s%> by lot אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לָתֵ֛ת <S%H5414><s%> to give לְתִשְׁעַ֥ת <S%H8672><s%> unto the nine הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <S%H4294><s%> tribes וַחֲצִ֥י <S%H2677><s%> and to the half הַמַּטֶּֽה׃ <S%H4294><s%> tribe

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לָקְח֞וּ <S%H3947><s%> have received מַטֵּ֨ה <S%H4294><s%> For the tribe בְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> of the children הָראוּבֵנִי֙ <S%H7206><s%> of Reuben לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> according to the house אֲבֹתָ֔ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers וּמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> and the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children הַגָּדִ֖י <S%H1410><s%> of Gad לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> according to the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers וַחֲצִי֙ <S%H2677><s%> [their inheritance] and half מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> the tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh לָקְח֖וּ <S%H3947><s%> have received נַחֲלָתָֽם׃ <S%H5159><s%> their inheritance

שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> The two הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <S%H4294><s%> tribes וַחֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> and the half הַמַּטֶּ֑ה <S%H4294><s%> tribe לָקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> have received נַחֲלָתָ֗ם <S%H5159><s%> their inheritance מֵעֵ֛בֶר <S%H5676><s%> on this side לְיַרְדֵּ֥ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan יְרֵח֖וֹ <S%H3405><s%> [near] Jericho קֵ֥דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> eastward מִזְרָֽחָה׃ <S%H4217><s%> toward the sunrising פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These שְׁמ֣וֹת <S%H8034><s%> These [are] the names הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> of the men אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יִנְחֲל֥וּ <S%H5157><s%> which shall divide לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֶלְעָזָר֙ <S%H499><s%> unto you Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וִיהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> and Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נֽוּן׃ <S%H5126><s%> of Nun

וְנָשִׂ֥יא <S%H5387><s%> prince אֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> one נָשִׂ֥יא <S%H5387><s%> leader אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> one מִמַּטֶּ֑ה <S%H4294><s%> of every tribe תִּקְח֖וּ <S%H3947><s%> And ye shall take לִנְחֹ֥ל <S%H5157><s%> by inheritance אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the land

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These שְׁמ֣וֹת <S%H8034><s%> And the names הָאֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H582><s%> of the men לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> [are] these Of the tribe יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah כָּלֵ֖ב <S%H3612><s%> Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְפֻנֶּֽה׃ <S%H3312><s%> of Jephunneh

וּלְמַטֵּה֙ <S%H4294><s%> And of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children שִׁמְע֔וֹן <S%H8095><s%> of Simeon שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> Shemuel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַמִּיהֽוּד׃ <S%H5989><s%> of Ammihud
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> Of the tribe בִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin אֱלִידָ֖ד <S%H449><s%> Elidad בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son כִּסְלֽוֹן׃ <S%H3692><s%> of Chislon

וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children דָ֖ן <S%H1835><s%> of Dan נָשִׂ֑יא <S%H5387><s%> And the prince בֻּקִּ֖י <S%H1231><s%> Bukki בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יָגְלִֽי׃ <S%H3020><s%> of Jogli

לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph לְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> for the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh נָשִׂ֑יא <S%H5387><s%> The prince חַנִּיאֵ֖ל <S%H2592><s%> Hanniel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֵפֹֽד׃ <S%H641><s%> of Ephod

וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim נָשִׂ֑יא <S%H5387><s%> And the prince קְמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H7055><s%> Kemuel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שִׁפְטָֽן׃ <S%H8204><s%> of Shiphtan

וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children זְבוּלֻ֖ן <S%H2074><s%> of Zebulun נָשִׂ֑יא <S%H5387><s%> And the prince אֱלִיצָפָ֖ן <S%H469><s%> Elizaphan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פַּרְנָֽךְ׃ <S%H6535><s%> of Parnach

וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשָׂשכָ֖ר <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar נָשִׂ֑יא <S%H5387><s%> And the prince פַּלְטִיאֵ֖ל <S%H6409><s%> Paltiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַזָּֽן׃ <S%H5821><s%> of Azzan

וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children אָשֵׁ֖ר <S%H836><s%> of Asher נָשִׂ֑יא <S%H5387><s%> And the prince אֲחִיה֖וּד <S%H282><s%> Ahihud בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שְׁלֹמִֽי׃ <S%H8015><s%> of Shelomi

וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children נַפְתָּלִ֖י <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali נָשִׂ֑יא <S%H5387><s%> And the prince פְּדַהְאֵ֖ל <S%H6300><s%> Pedahel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַמִּיהֽוּד׃ <S%H5989><s%> of Ammihud

אֵ֕לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> whom צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> These [are they] whom the LORD לְנַחֵ֥ל <S%H5157><s%> to divide the inheritance אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan פ
